starwars

Interface SWForceEntityInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BenKenobi, LightSaber, Player, SWForceActor, SWForceEntity, SWLegend

    public interface SWForceEntityInterface
extends EntityInterface
    All ForceEntities and ForceActors in the starwars client package should implement this interface. It allows them to be managed by the EntityManager and perform force related functions and behaviours we set the default power requirements for certain objects, like mind control and wielding a force weapon.
    Author:
    ram
    See Also:
    EntityInterface, EntityManager
